title: Looking for Members for Ranked 5v's Team. Semi Serious
body:
Looking for active players, with a good knowledge of the game, who are willing to put the time in to make this team work. Diamond Elo or above is a must, looking for players to fill the role of, Top, JG & Support. Must keep a calm head and not be toxic whatsoever, able to work well in a team environment. Add my in game if interested in trailing. 

- Player One

replies.body: Hi, Diamond Support main, added you ingame :)
